name: Diamond Thieves
overview: The age-old rivalry between aliens and robots rages on! On a remote world, you are a little green alien scouring the universe in search of valuable diamonds, hoping to collect as many as possible before the evil robots can get their greasy, mechanical claws on them. Journey through exotic landscapes, jumping on springs, unearthing keys to open locked doors, recovering your energy where needed, all while minding the hostile animals roaming each area. But the local fauna aren't your only enemies; be on the lookout, because various robots are also looking for the valuable diamonds you seek. It's a race against time, and there is no honor among...Diamond Thieves!
